item.title: Contact
item.description:
Feel free to contact me if you have any questions about my research. I am also interested in helping students that are looking for opportunities in astrophysics research. If this interests you, don’t hesitate to write to me!

The best way to reach me is by writing a mail to:
sudarshan [at] mpia [dot] de

or drop by my office (217),
Max Planck Institute for Astronomy,
KÃ¶nigstuhl 17,
69117 Heidelberg.
